data.title: Old KL Train Station
data.meta_description: One of KL's most distinctive colonial buildings, this grand 1910 train station (replaced as a transit hub by KL Sentral in 2001) was designed by British…

0.61 MILES

6.86 MILES

No cave at Batu is more spectacularly embellished than Ramayana Cave, which boasts psychedelic dioramas of the Indian epic 'Ramayana'. Pass the green, 15m…

0.45 MILES

1 . Malayan Railway Administration Building

0.07 MILES

KTM has its offices in this handsome Indo-Saracenic piece of architecture, dating back to 1917.

0.2 MILES

0.28 MILES
